swf.name: DynamicDestruction
swf.short: Showing how one might perform destructions of dynamic objects.

long.text: Using MarchingSquares and magic we can destroy dynamics bodies as well producing new sets of bodies when a body is split into more than 1 connected piece and so we have this fun demo.
Click to blow a hole into the bodies, if a resultant body has an area smaller than 400px^2 it is removed
